name: Casino Managment
summary: Step into the role of a visionary casino manager in "Casino Management," a thrilling arcade idle game where strategy meets fun. Build, expand, and optimize your casino to attract guests and grow your business empire. Design stunning layouts, manage staff, and create a luxurious experience for your visitors. With no gambling involved, this game focuses on the art of management and decision-making, offering an exciting challenge for players of all ages. Start building your dream casino today!
